Classes/IBANTextField.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.name: iban
Classes/IBANTextField.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.abstract: The IBAN entered in the text field, or nil if no valid IBAN has been entered.

Classes/IBANValidator.html#/s:ZFC5Adyen1.name: isValid(_:)
Classes/IBANValidator.html#/s:ZFC5Adyen1.abstract: Checks if the given string is a valid IBAN value.

Structs/IBANSpecification.html#/s:vV5Ady.name: countryCode
Structs/IBANSpecification.html#/s:vV5Ady.abstract: The code of the country to which the specifications apply.

Structs/IBANSpecification.html#/s:FV5Ady.name: init(forCountryCode:)
Structs/IBANSpecification.html#/s:FV5Ady.abstract: Returns the IBAN specification for the country with the given code, or nil if none could be found.

Classes/CardValidator.html#/s:ZFC5Adyen1.name: validate(cardNumber:acceptedCardTypes:)
Classes/CardValidator.html#/s:ZFC5Adyen1.abstract: Validates and formats the given card number, and detects the corresponding card type.

Classes/CardValidator.html#/s:ZFC5Adyen1.name: validate(expiryDate:separator:)
Classes/CardValidator.html#/s:ZFC5Adyen1.abstract: Validates and formats the given expiration date.

Enums/CardType.html#/s:ZvO5Adyen8CardTyp.name: all
Enums/CardType.html#/s:ZvO5Adyen8CardTyp.abstract: Array containing all card types in this enum.

Enums/CardType.html.name: CardType
Enums/CardType.html.abstract: Enum containing most known types of credit and debit cards.

Classes/CardValidator.html.name: CardValidator
Classes/CardValidator.html.abstract: An object that provides static methods for validating and formatting card numbers, expiry dates, and cvc values, and detecting card types.

Structs/IBANSpecification.html.name: IBANSpecification
Structs/IBANSpecification.html.abstract: Contains the country-specific specifications for countries that adopt the IBAN standard.

Classes/IBANValidator.html.name: IBANValidator
Classes/IBANValidator.html.abstract: An object that provides a static method to validate IBAN values.

Classes/IBANTextField.html.name: IBANTextField
Classes/IBANTextField.html.abstract: A text field object designed for the entry of an IBAN value. This field formats and validates the IBAN in real time.

Structs/PayPalOneClickInfo.html#/s:vV5Ad.name: emailAddress
Structs/PayPalOneClickInfo.html#/s:vV5Ad.abstract: The email address of the PayPal account.

Structs/CardOneClickInfo.html#/s:vV5Adye.name: number
Structs/CardOneClickInfo.html#/s:vV5Adye.abstract: A shortened version of the card’s number.

Classes/InputSelectItem.html#/s:vC5Adyen.name: identifier
Classes/InputSelectItem.html#/s:vC5Adyen.abstract: Identifier of an item. Upon selection, the value of this property should be assigned to the value property of the InputDetail object.

Classes/InputSelectItem.html#/s:vC5Adyen.name: imageURL
Classes/InputSelectItem.html#/s:vC5Adyen.abstract: Optional URL for the icon of an item.

Enums/InputType.html#/s:FO5Adyen9InputTy.name: select
Enums/InputType.html#/s:FO5Adyen9InputTy.abstract: Input type should be selected from the given list.

Enums/InputType.html#/s:FO5Adyen9InputTy.name: cardToken
Enums/InputType.html#/s:FO5Adyen9InputTy.abstract: Card token input type. By default, cvcOptional is false.

Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:vC5Adyen11In.name: optional
Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:vC5Adyen11In.abstract: Whether or not the detail is optional.

Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:vC5Adyen11In.name: items
Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:vC5Adyen11In.abstract: An array of InputSelectItem. Only be available if type is .select.

Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:vC5Adyen11In.name: inputDetails
Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:vC5Adyen11In.abstract: An array of input details nested in the receiver.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.name: setDetail(value:forKey:)
Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.abstract: Update the detail defined by a given key with the string value provided.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.name: setDetail(value:forKey:)
Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.abstract: Update the detail defined by a given key with the bool value provided.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.name: fillApplePay(token:)
Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.abstract: Fills details for the Apple Pay transaction.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.name: fillCard(token:storeDetails:)
Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.abstract: Fills details for the card transaction with a token.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.name: fillCard(cvc:)
Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.abstract: Fills details for the card transaction with CVC.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.name: fillCard(installmentPlanIdentifier:)
Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.abstract: Fills installments selection for the card transaction.

Classes/PaymentDetails/Address.html.name: Address
Classes/PaymentDetails/Address.html.abstract: An object that represents an address requested in PaymentDetails.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.name: fillBillingAddress(_:)
Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.abstract: Fills the billing address for a transaction that requires AVS.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.name: logoURL
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.abstract: A URL to the logo of the payment method.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.name: members
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.abstract: Members of the payment method (only applicable when the receiver is a group).

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.name: isOneClick
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the payment method is a one-click payment method, which means that it can be easily completed by the user.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.name: oneClickInfo
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.abstract: The information that was stored for this payment payment method, or nil if this is not a one-click payment method.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.name: inputDetails
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.abstract: The input details that should be filled in to complete the payment.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.name: oneClick
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:vC5Adyen13.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the payment method is a one-click payment method, which means that it can be easily completed by the user.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html.name: PaymentMethod
Classes/PaymentMethod.html.abstract: An object representing a payment method used to complete a payment.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html.name: PaymentDetails
Classes/PaymentDetails.html.abstract: An object that holds the list of InputDetail items required for to process a transaction.

Classes/InputDetail.html.name: InputDetail
Classes/InputDetail.html.abstract: An object describing a payment detail required to process the transaction.

Classes/InputSelectItem.html.name: InputSelectItem
Classes/InputSelectItem.html.abstract: An object representing a selectable item used in InputDetail with select type.

Payment Method.html#/s:P5Adyen12OneClick.name: OneClickInfo
Payment Method.html#/s:P5Adyen12OneClick.abstract: Instances conforming to this protocol provide access to the information that was stored for a payment method.

Structs/CardOneClickInfo.html.name: CardOneClickInfo
Structs/CardOneClickInfo.html.abstract: Object that contains stored card info used to perform previous card payments.

Structs/PayPalOneClickInfo.html.name: PayPalOneClickInfo
Structs/PayPalOneClickInfo.html.abstract: Object that contains stored info used to perform previous PayPal payments.

Enums/PaymentRequestResult.html#/s:FO5Ad.name: payment
Enums/PaymentRequestResult.html#/s:FO5Ad.abstract: In case of success a Payment object will be returned.

Enums/PaymentRequestResult.html#/s:FO5Ad.name: error
Enums/PaymentRequestResult.html#/s:FO5Ad.abstract: In case of failure an Error will be returned.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:requiresPaymentDataForToken:completion:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Given the PaymentRequest that started the payment flow and token, waits for data from merchant server to be passed via completion.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:requiresPaymentMethodFrom:available:completion:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Given a list of PaymentMethod (available and preferred) waits for the selection via completion.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:requiresReturnURLFrom:completion:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: This method is called when a URL redirection needs to be executed. Use the url to continue payment flow in Safari or SFSafariViewController. After the process is completed, the completion for the given URL must be called.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:requiresPaymentDetails:completion:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: This method is called when input is needed for completing the transation. The filled PaymentDetails should be sent via completion.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:didFinishWith:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: This method is called when the payment flow is finished.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.name: init(delegate:)
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.abstract: Creates a PaymentRequest object and initialises it with a provided delegate.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:vC5Adyen1.name: delegate
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:vC5Adyen1.abstract: Delegate for controlling the payment flow. See PaymentRequestDelegate.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:vC5Adyen1.name: generationTime
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:vC5Adyen1.abstract: Generation time. Used for generating a token for card payments.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:vC5Adyen1.name: publicKey
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:vC5Adyen1.abstract: Public key. Used for generating a token for card payments.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.name: deletePreferred(paymentMethod:completion:)
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:FC5Adyen1.abstract: Permanently deletes payment method from shopper’s preferred payment options.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html.name: PaymentRequestDelegate
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html.abstract: The payment request delegate. Used for Custom integration comunication. All delegate methods are invoked on the main thread.

Classes/Payment.html#/s:vC5Adyen7Payment.name: method
Classes/Payment.html#/s:vC5Adyen7Payment.abstract: The method that was used to complete the payment.

Classes/Payment.html#/s:vC5Adyen7Payment.name: payload
Classes/Payment.html#/s:vC5Adyen7Payment.abstract: The payload as returned from the server.

Classes/Payment.html#/s:vC5Adyen7Payment.name: amount
Classes/Payment.html#/s:vC5Adyen7Payment.abstract: The amount of the payment, in minor units.

Classes/Payment.html#/s:vC5Adyen7Payment.name: currencyCode
Classes/Payment.html#/s:vC5Adyen7Payment.abstract: The code of the currency for the payment amount.

Classes/Payment.html.name: Payment
Classes/Payment.html.abstract: An object that represents a payment that has been completed by the user. The result of the payment can be retrieved via the status property.

Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: navigationBarTitleTextAttributes
Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The attributes used for the navigation bar’s title.

Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: isNavigationBarTranslucent
Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the navigation bar is translucent.

Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: navigationBarCancelButtonImage
Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The image of the cancel button in the navigation bar, or nil if a title should be used instead.

Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: checkoutButtonTitleTextAttributes
Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The attributes used for the checkout button’s title.

Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: checkoutButtonTitleEdgeInsets
Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The insets from the edges of the checkout button to the title.

Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: checkoutButtonCornerRadius
Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The corner radius of the checkout button.

Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: tintColor
Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The tint color for most buttons and actionable elements.

Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: default
Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Returns an instance of the default appearance configuration.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.name: shouldShowCardScanButton(for:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.abstract: Invoked when the card payment method is selected.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.name: scanCard(for:completion:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.abstract: Invoked when the card scan button is tapped.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.name: checkoutViewController(_:requiresPaymentDataForToken:completion:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.abstract: Invoked when the payment flow has started and payment data is requested from the merchant server.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.name: checkoutViewController(_:requiresReturnURL:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.abstract: Invoked when the redirection to a URL has been made. The given completion handler should be invoked when the user returns to the application through a URL.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.name: checkoutViewController(_:didFinishWith:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.abstract: Invoked when the payment flow has finished.

Classes/CheckoutViewController.html#/s:v.name: cardScanDelegate
Classes/CheckoutViewController.html#/s:v.abstract: The delegate for card scanning functionality for card payments.

Classes/CheckoutViewController.html.name: CheckoutViewController
Classes/CheckoutViewController.html.abstract: The starting point for Quick integration. Initialize and present this view controller in your app to start the payment flow. If you don’t embed the CheckoutViewController in a UINavigationController instance, a new one will be created automatically.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.name: CheckoutViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.abstract: The CheckoutViewControllerDelegate protocol defines the methods that a delegate of CheckoutViewController should implement to provide payment data and be informed of the payment flow progress.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.name: CheckoutViewControllerCardScanDelegate
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.abstract: The CheckoutViewControllerCardScanDelegate protocol defines methods that the cardScanDelegate of CheckoutViewController should implement to enable card scanning functionality for card payment methods.

Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html.name: AppearanceConfiguration
Classes/AppearanceConfiguration.html.abstract: An object used to customize the appearance of the UI components provided by this SDK.
